name: FUM
description:
FUM
A game build for Fum

An Adventuring Character got transported into another world. He will explore the current world trying to find a way home. However, enemies roam around and will find their way to kill you.

For players who like rogue-like games with item looting and enemy difficulty scaling.

Project Description

Game was underdevelopment for 1 month for an advance programming module.
